file.violation: Avoid non-final or mutable static fields. Make final immutable or access thread-safely and use @GuardedBy.
Avoid non-final or mutable static fields. Make final immutable or access thread-safely and use @GuardedBy.
A Calendar is used to create a Date or DateTime, this is expensive.
